attributes.OfferingsTitle: How do we get you there?
attributes.OurClientsParagraph:
…the ability rivaling that of any of the big5 consulting firms, combined with the agility of a boutique player to provide cutting-edge analytics.

Find below the differentiators that give us a proven competitive edge in our category:

HeroHeader.Description: Kavi Global is a pure play data and analytics company offering a comprehensive set of data analytics solutions, software and services invested in business value co-creation and knowledge sharing.

Achievements.Title: With Kavi Global, clients like you so far got to achieve…
Achievements.Paragraph:
We have been serving clients across a wide range of verticals including transportation, healthcare, manufacturing,
higher education, digital marketing and more and have help them achieve

Offerings.Title: Services
Offerings.PreviewText: Help our partners across the data analytics lifecycle by providing all required services to support their data analytics operations (data gathering, engineering, science, and others) and provide the operational support to assist partners in their journey to digitalization.

Offerings.Title: Solutions
Offerings.PreviewText: Deliver both industry standard and enterprise specific data analytics solutions and technologies across key business functions of the organization; bringing industry expertise and best practices in order to generate and capture value through data.

Offerings.Title: Software
Offerings.PreviewText: Offer a patented, comprehensive, No-Code, technology agnostic, data analytics software to the market to help business professional, data engineers and scientists thrive in their analytical goals.

Offerings.Title: Kavi Labs
Offerings.PreviewText: Innovation arm for solution incubation bringing innovation to enterprises and research institutions through data analytics, leveraging the latest emerging technologies & best practice innovation framework.

Analytics.Title: Seek to get more out of analytics
Analytics.PreviewText: Our advanced machine learning & data science capabilities enable you to do more with data analytics.

OurClientDescription.Title: Strategy
OurClientDescription.Paragraph: Don’t settle just for the “What”. Also demand the Blueprint on “How”.

OurClientDescription.Title: Consulting
OurClientDescription.Paragraph: Focus on Solution & Outcomes, not the on-going head count.

attributes.Title: Intelligent Augmented Reality
attributes.Content: Augmented Reality Creates Business Values Recent technological advancements have made it possible to seamlessly overlay computer-generated virtual images onto real- world objects. This is done in such a way that the virtual content can be viewed and interacted with in real-time.

attributes.Title: Unlocking Value using
attributes.Content: To keep ahead of today’s competition, businesses need to be constantly evaluating and evolving their offerings and how they engage with their customers. While trying to increase business agility and shorten time to market, existing inefficiencies become more complex and interdependent, and solutions require a higher altitude perspective.

attributes.Title: Kavi Global Wins
attributes.Content: Kavi Global has been honored with this award for delighting clients across the healthcare ecosystem. The Kavi Team has both breadth and depth in the healthcare domain. They have delivered innovative data analytics solutions on the cloud for hospitals, providers, and payers.

attributes.Title: Advana DaaS and Data Catalog
attributes.Content: Kavi Global announced the general release of DaaS (Data as a Service) and Data Catalog features in their flagship No-Code Data Engineering and Data Science software, Advana.

attributes.Title: Kavi Global Announces Research
attributes.Content: Data Scientists at Kavi Global will collaborate with Clinician Scientists at Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago who have been awarded the Perinatal Origins of Disease (POD) Healthy Start Pilot Grant for their novel proposal to develop an AI enabled Computer Vision Solution to automatically detects pain and distress in fetuses from 4D ultrasounds using a Facial Coding System

attributes.Title: Northwestern Data Scientists
attributes.Content: Low-code paradigm is shaping the future of Data and Analytics, arming organizations with high productivity and low total cost of ownership. Low-Code in Data and Analytics is following in the footsteps of predecessor, Low-Code Application Development (LCAD).

attributes.Title: Wheel Remaining Useful Life
attributes.Content: Calculated decay rates for different locomotive types. Performed a benefit-risk analysis on shifting policy limits. Derived a detailed decision diagram that helps shop manage replacement & truing events.

attributes.Title: IIoT Preventative Maintenance Platform
attributes.Content: A flexible, scalable and comprehensive Distributed Sensor Solutions Platform that can be deployed either on the cloud or on premise. The platform provides streaming data ingestion and analytics on critical assets to ensure high standards of safety, availability and cost optimization.
